alert.note: Alert for Christian; Hopkins; Muhlenberg (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 26 at 12:01AM EDT until June 26 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM CDT FOR MUHLENBERG...NORTHEASTERN CHRISTIAN AND SOUTHEASTERN HOPKINS COUNTIES... At 1100 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles northeast of Dunmor to near Weir, moving east southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Central City, Powderly, Graham, Greenville, Weir, Dunmor, White Plains and Drakesboro. This includes Western Kentucky Parkway between Mile Markers 41 and 62. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
